20101231074207.000|20101231074209.000|CC1|IN YOUR BRAIN THAT YOU CAN SHIFT
20101231074209.000|20101231074211.000|CC1|FROM ONE HEMISPHERE TO ANOTHER. 
20101231074211.000|20101231074212.000|CC1|LANGUAGE WHICH IS 98% OF PEOPLE
